quote_first: A picnic lunch in the kitchen, a double bolt drawn across the front door just in case the impossible happened and Father came home from the bank before
quote_raw: A picnic lunch in the kitchen, a double bolt drawn across the front door just in case the impossible happened and Father came home from the bank before twenty-three minutes past six in the evening.
title: Light a Penny Candle
author: Maeve Binchy
